name: Fate: The Broken Thread
description:
Fate: The Broken Thread follows Gobanath who missed his fated death. Now the world is repelling him, treating him as an aberration, needing to be destroyed. Will Gobanath be able to avoid his fate, or will order be restored to the world?

This game is being submitted to the GameOff 2021 with the Theme 

This 2d rouge-like action platform is procedurally generated.

ConnorBS and EmeronGS worked on and created this game.
